text: Guys, when you hear the name of Sahara, the world's hottest desert
then what comes to your mind is hot winds, sand or lack of water
but you will be surprised to know that there is snowfall in the Sahara
yes guys, you are listening right
in that desert where water is difficult to get, there is snowfall
before this, everyone considered it magic
but now its scientific truth has been known
it's that sometimes the moisture of the air hits the Sahara mountains
and becomes so cold that it starts snowing there
so guys, isn't it an amazing fact that looks like magic?
and for more such amazing fact videos "Share", "Subscribe" and "Like" us
see you in the next video
